name: Robert Earl BUTTS, Jr., petitioner, v. GEORGIA.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Robert Earl BUTTS, Jr., petitioner,
v.
GEORGIA.
attorneys: Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Georgia denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Robert Earl BUTTS, Jr., petitioner,
v.
GEORGIA.
No. 17-8787 (17A1220).
Supreme Court of the United States
May 4, 2018.
Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Georgia denied.
